name: 9mm Obsidian Round
description: 9mm Obsidian Rounds are an alternative to 9mm Incendiary Rounds that deals fire damage on hit and has a chance to apply a unique debuff to targets while also setting them ablaze. Although it may have a low percent chance of setting targets on fire, 9mm Obsidian Rounds excel when used against Fauna that have a weakness to fire, dealing more damage than 9mm Rounds . A list of fauna that are weak to fire can be viewed here .
